title: hEmagirisa manOnmaNi
sahitya:
hEmagirisha manOnmaNi ambA himAcala bAlE iShvari



anupallavi



sOma mNDala jitamukha rAjitE sumukha shaNmukha sEvitapAdE



caraNam



shrIkaNTASTOttara shatanAma kIrtanAnugrahaparE bhAsurE

mUka vAgpradE munigaNa sEvitE shrIkara harikEshOllAsE
